text: For activation of <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> signaling , 5x104 HI5 insect cells or HI5 insect cells expressing mouse <extra_id_0> CD154 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> CD40 ligand <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) were added to 1x106 B cells .
Cells were centrifuged for 1 minute at 400 x g ( to promote contact between ligand cells and B cells ) then incubated at 37degreesC for times indicated in Fig . 4 .
Following stimulation , cells were chilled on ice for 2 minutes .
Cell pellets were dissolved in 2X SDS-PAGE loading buffer , sonicated , and heated for 5 minutes at 95degreesC .
Total cell lysates ( 1x105 cell equivalents per lane ) were fractionated by SDS-PAGE and blotted to polyvinylidine fluoride ( PVDF ) membranes .
Membranes were probed with antibodies as indicated in Fig . 4 .
Chemiluminescent detection ( Pierce Biotechnology ) was used for the visualization of bands on Western blots .
Images of blots were recorded with a low - light imaging system ( LAS4000 , Fuji Medical Systems ) and on X-ray film .
